review: I have had the Roku box, Apple TV and now Amazon Fire TV box.. The Amazon Fire TV Box works better than the other two. What I really like about it is the Voice activated search! This is a very valuable tool that I use to find shows or Movies on with out using the silly keyboard.. Movie cashing works well too..
author: Gordon V Rose

review: So far I really love this.  Its easy to set up and use.  The voice search works very well.  I wish there was a little more "free" content through Prime and that there was an easier way to set it up so it only displays the free stuff in the search.  My kids get disappointed when they search for Dora the Explorer and then find that everything except for season 1 episodes cost extra. It would be nice to be able to ONLY search free content.
author: arylith
